access_mode.label: Access Mode
access_mode.description: Mode of transport to access public transport stations

pt_egress_mode.label: Egress Mode
pt_egress_mode.description: Mode of transport after leaving public transport stations

catchment_area_type.label: Catchment area shape
catchment_area_type.description: Select the shape of the catchment area geometry.

polygon_difference.label: Polygon Difference
polygon_difference.description: If enabled, polygons show the difference between consecutive steps

choose_pt_mode.label: Choose PT Modes
choose_pt_mode.description: Select public transport modes to include in the analysis

impedance.label: Impedance Function
impedance.description: Distance decay function for gravity calculation

max_sensitivity.label: Maximum Sensitivity
max_sensitivity.description: Maximum sensitivity value used for normalization

opportunities.label: Opportunities
opportunities.description: List of opportunity datasets with gravity parameters

input_path.label: Input Layer
input_path.description: Select the input layer for analysis

input_layer_id.label: Input Layer
input_layer_id.description: Select the input layer for analysis

sensitivity.label: Sensitivity
sensitivity.description: Decay sensitivity parameter for gravity model

potential_field.label: Potential Field
potential_field.description: Field name containing destination potential values

potential_constant.label: Constant Potential
potential_constant.description: Use a constant value for all destinations

n_destinations.label: Number of Destinations
n_destinations.description: Number of closest destinations to average

reference_area_path.label: Reference Area
reference_area_path.description: Layer defining the reference area for connectivity analysis

weekday.label: Day
weekday.description: Type of day for public transport schedule

from_time.label: Start Time
from_time.description: Start time of the analysis window

to_time.label: End Time
to_time.description: End time of the analysis window

distance_type.label: Distance Source
distance_type.description: How to determine the buffer distance

distances.label: Buffer Distances
distances.description: List of buffer distances to create

distance_field.label: Distance Field
distance_field.description: Field containing buffer distance for each feature

dissolve.label: Dissolve
dissolve.description: Merge overlapping buffers into single geometry

num_triangles.label: Curve Smoothness
num_triangles.description: Number of segments to approximate curves

join_style.label: Join Style
join_style.description: Style for corner joins between segments

input_fields.label: Input Fields
input_fields.description: Fields to keep from input layer

overlay_fields.label: Overlay Fields
overlay_fields.description: Fields to keep from overlay layer

geometry_layer_id.label: Geometry Layer
geometry_layer_id.description: Layer with origin/destination geometries (points or polygons)

wfs_layer_name.label: WFS Layer Name
wfs_layer_name.description: Name of the layer in WFS service

data_type.label: Data Type
data_type.description: Type of data for WFS layer

query.label: Filter Query
query.description: SQL WHERE clause to filter features

measure_type.label: Catchment area type
measure_type.description: Calculate catchment area by time or distance

max_distance.label: Travel distance
max_distance.description: Define the maximum travel distance in meters

source_layer_id.label: Input Point Layer
source_layer_id.description: Select the point layer to aggregate

select_source_layer.label: Input Point Layer
select_source_layer.description: Select the point layer to aggregate

area_type.label: Area Type
area_type.description: Type of area to aggregate points into

select_area_type.label: Area Type
select_area_type.description: Type of area to aggregate points into

area_layer_id.label: Area Layer
area_layer_id.description: Select the polygon layer for aggregation

select_area_layer.label: Area Layer
select_area_layer.description: Select the polygon layer for aggregation

h3_resolution.label: H3 Resolution
h3_resolution.description: H3 grid resolution (3-10). Higher values create smaller hexagons.

select_h3_grid_resolution.label: H3 Grid Resolution
select_h3_grid_resolution.description: H3 grid resolution (3-10). Higher values create smaller hexagons.

select_statistic_method.label: Statistic Method
select_statistic_method.description: Statistical operation to perform: count, sum, mean, min, or max.

select_field_to_calculate_statistics.label: Statistics Field
select_field_to_calculate_statistics.description: Select the field to compute statistics on.

group_by_field.label: Group By
group_by_field.description: Field(s) to group aggregated results by

select_group_fields.label: Group Fields
select_group_fields.description: Optional field(s) to group aggregated results by.

weighted_by_intersecting_area.label: Weight by Intersection Area
weighted_by_intersecting_area.description: If enabled, statistics are weighted proportionally by the area of intersection between source and target polygons.

select_statistics_configuration.label: Statistics Configuration
select_statistics_configuration.description: Configure the statistical operation and field for aggregation.

full_address_field.label: Address Field
full_address_field.description: Column containing complete address (e.g., 'Marienplatz 1, Munich, Germany')

locality_field.label: City/Town
locality_field.description: Column for city or town name

region_field.label: State/Province
region_field.description: Column for state, province, or region

country_field.label: Country Field
country_field.description: Column for country (name or ISO code). Leave empty to use default.

country_constant.label: Default Country
country_constant.description: Default country when no country field is selected

target_layer_id.label: Target Layer
target_layer_id.description: The layer to which join layer fields will be appended

join_layer_id.label: Join Layer
join_layer_id.description: The layer containing fields to append to the target layer

join_method.label: Join Method
join_method.description: How to match features between the target and join layers

spatial_relationship.label: Spatial Relationship
spatial_relationship.description: The spatial relationship used to match features

use_spatial_relationship.label: Spatial Match
use_spatial_relationship.description: Match features based on their spatial location

use_attribute_relationship.label: Attribute Match
use_attribute_relationship.description: Match features based on attribute values

distance.label: Search Distance
distance.description: Search distance for the within_distance relationship

attribute_relationships.label: Match Fields
attribute_relationships.description: Fields to match between target and join layers

target_field.label: Target Field
target_field.description: Field in target layer to match

join_field.label: Join Field
join_field.description: Field in join layer to match

join_operation.label: Match Handling
join_operation.description: How to handle multiple matching features

multiple_matching_records.label: Multiple Matches
multiple_matching_records.description: How to handle multiple matching records in one-to-one joins

join_type.label: Join Type
join_type.description: Determines which features appear in the output

calculate_statistics.label: Calculate Statistics
calculate_statistics.description: Calculate statistics for numeric fields when multiple records match

sort_configuration.label: Order By
sort_configuration.description: Sort order for selecting the first matching record

field_statistics.label: Statistics
field_statistics.description: Statistics to calculate for matching records

buffer.title: Buffer
buffer.description: Creates buffer polygons around input features at a specified distance. Supports multiple distance values and dissolving overlapping buffers.

clip.title: Clip
clip.description: Extracts input features that fall within the clip geometry. Only the portions of input features inside the clip boundary are kept.

centroid.title: Centroid
centroid.description: Creates a point feature class containing the geometric center (centroid) of each input feature.

intersection.title: Intersection
intersection.description: Computes the geometric intersection of two layers. Features or portions of features that overlap in both layers are written to the output, preserving attributes from both.

aggregate_points.title: Aggregate Points
aggregate_points.description: Summarizes point features within designated areas. Calculates the total count of points and computes statistics like sum, mean, min, or max for each area.

union.title: Union
union.description: Computes the geometric union of two layers. All features and their attributes from both input layers are written to the output.

difference.title: Erase
difference.description: Creates a feature class by overlaying input features with erase features. Only portions of input features falling outside the erase geometry are kept.

origin_destination.title: Origin-Destination
origin_destination.description: The Origin-Destination analysis is used in various fields such as transport planning and urban planning to study movements or flows between different locations.

heatmap_gravity.title: Heatmap Gravity
heatmap_gravity.description: The accessibility is calculated from each grid cell to multiple locations simultaneously. The travel times are weighted and aggregated using an impedance function.

heatmap_closest_average.title: Heatmap Closest Average
heatmap_closest_average.description: The average travel time to the nearest N destinations is shown, starting from each grid cell.

heatmap_connectivity.title: Heatmap Connectivity
heatmap_connectivity.description: Connectivity of transport routes is determined by calculating catchment areas for each grid cell, where the reached area is the measure for connectivity.

oev_gueteklassen.title: ÖV-Güteklassen
oev_gueteklassen.description: The Public Transport Quality Classes (German: ÖV-Güteklassen) show the attractiveness of public transport services for a selected area.

layer_import.title: Import Layer
layer_import.description: Import geospatial data from external sources

feature_count.title: Feature Count
feature_count.description: Count features in a collection with optional filtering

unique_values.title: Unique Values
unique_values.description: Get unique values for an attribute with occurrence counts

class_breaks.title: Class Breaks
class_breaks.description: Calculate classification breaks for a numeric attribute

area_statistics.title: Area Statistics
area_statistics.description: Calculate area statistics for polygon features

catchment_area.title: Catchment Area
catchment_area.description: Catchment Areas show how far people can travel within a set travel time or distance from one or more selected points.

aggregate_polygon.title: Aggregate Polygons
aggregate_polygon.description: Summarizes polygon features within designated areas. Calculates statistics like count, sum, mean, min, or max for each area. Supports weighting by intersection area ratio.

geocoding.title: Geocoding
geocoding.description: Convert addresses to geographic coordinates. Supports both full address strings and structured address components.

join.title: Join Features
join.description: Transfers attributes from one layer to another based on spatial and attribute relationships. Optionally, statistics can be calculated for the joined features.
